definition: horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
variant of 克[ke4]/to subdue/to overthrow/to restrain
Ke (c. 2000 BC), seventh of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
abbr. for 克羅地亞|克罗地亚[Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4], Croatia/(Tw) abbr. for 克羅埃西亞|克罗埃西亚[Ke4 luo2 ai1 xi1 ya4], Croatia
owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)
surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy

sentences.english: Marxism faith is magistral faith of China.
sentences.chinese: 马克思主义信仰是中国社会的主导信仰。

sentences.english: Inculcation is the basic way of Marxist theory education.
sentences.chinese: 灌输是马克思主义政治教育的基本原则。

sentences.english: Second, the paper scrutinizes the Confucianists ideas in the way of the Marxism outlook .
sentences.chinese: 第二部分主要是用马克思主义观点审视儒家德治思想。

sentences.english: Marxism believes in the primacy of matter.
sentences.chinese: 马克思主义相信物质是第一性的。

sentences.english: The Reception Study of Georg Lukács s Literature and Art Theory in China;
sentences.chinese: 马克思主义文艺理论是中国文艺理论的支柱和来源。
他们明目张胆地篡改马克思主义。

sentences.english: According to Marxist theory, the Concept of Life and Death is exactly the World Outlook.
sentences.chinese: 按照马克思主义的说法，生死观就是世界观。

sentences.english: By that time he already possessed a profound knowledge of Marxism.
sentences.chinese: 到这时，他对马克思主义己经有了深刻了解。

sentences.english: Was ready to finance efforts to overthrow the Marxist government of Chile whose President was Salvadore Allende.
sentences.chinese: 阿连德为总统的智利马克思主义政府的种种尝试。

sentences.english: And evetually the Chinese people chose Marxism, for which is related by blood with the Chinese traditional culture.
sentences.chinese: 马克思主义和中国传统文化血脉是相通的。

sentences.english: The process of Marxism Sinicization is the continuous process of emancipating the mind.
sentences.chinese: 马克思主义中国化的进程，就是不断解放思想的进程。

sentences.english: The sinicization of Marxism is an important subject concerns the future and the destiny of the Communist Party of China.
sentences.chinese: 马克思主义中国化是关系党的前途和命运的重大课题。

sentences.english: Marxist ideology dominating the world, academia, of course, exemplifies the exception.
sentences.chinese: 马克思主义思想一统天下，学术界当然是莫能例外。

sentences.english: The thesis has analysed background brought forward by Marxism incorrupt government thought first.
sentences.chinese: 论文首先分析了马克思主义廉政思想提出的背景。

sentences.english: It isn’t easy teaching Marxism in China these days.
sentences.chinese: 这些年在中国教马克思主义并不容易。

sentences.english: Scientific productivity theory is the foundation of Marxism materialist conception of history.
sentences.chinese: 科学的生产力理论是马克思主义唯物史观的基础。

definition: materialism, philosophical doctrine that physical matter is the whole of reality
Deng Xiaoping Theory/Dengism/the foundation of PRC economic development after the Cultural Revolution, building the capitalist economy within Chinese Communist Party control
the philosophy of materialism, doctrine that physical matter is the whole of reality
Manifesto of the Communist Party/"Manifest der Kommunistischen Partei" by Marx and Engels (1848)
epistemology (in philosophy, the theory of how we know things)
